channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On $\theta$-extension of continuous mapping
item.description: arXiv:2506.02228v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We consider the problem of constructing a weakly-continuous mapping extending continuous mapping defined on a dense set of a topological space to the entire space. Theorem on necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of such an extension are proved. The axioms of separation and compactness of spaces are not assumed.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ryabikov
